description:
We have hacking checks to prevent importing anything other than a module. The exception to this is the `_` translation function.

Now that we're using `_LW`, `_LE`, etc we need to include those as exceptions as well.

This involves just modifying the tox.ini to includes these exceptions explicitly.

Reference: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/LoggingStandards#Log_Translation
title: Hacking.py exceptions for _LW and the like

comments.content:
We have hacking checks to prevent importing anything other than a module. The exception to this is the `_` translation function.

Now that we're using `_LW`, `_LE`, etc we need to include those as exceptions as well.

Reference: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/LoggingStandards#Log_Translation

comments.content: Hold on, this might be a dupe, and possibly already fixed...
